content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received human feedback expressing confusion about AI cheating or toxic behavior in a game like League of Legends and questioning the need for legal and intellectual property considerations. The user requested a cooperative AI opponent or ally and provided instructions in English for programming. My latest action was receiving a blank command from the user.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Human feedback: thank you for understanding that all i am looking for is to create an AI that can play the game with me, for fun and for the purpose of getting better at the game. as far as API goes, i am not really sure if League of Legends has an API. but i know that there have been several AI players created, for DotA2 for instance, that were able to learn the game and become very good at it. so i think maybe we'd want to draw inspiration into how they were able to do that, and adjust it for League of Legends. We would probably need the programs to run on Windows, because that is where league of legends runs best. or Mac, but Macs are expensive and i don't have the funds right now to buy a new Mac laptop for this purpose. "}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": ""}}'}]
"""
